about.title: The story behind Till Freitag Agency

why.title: Why we chose Lovable
why.text: Lovable revolutionizes how we build web applications. It's not just about speed - it's about creating beautiful, maintainable applications that our clients love. Till discovered this platform and knew it was the future of development.

for.title: Who we serve
for.text: Startups looking to launch fast, established companies needing modern web solutions, and teams wanting to learn cutting-edge development practices. If you have a digital vision, we make it reality.

unique.title: What makes us different
unique.text: We're not just developers - we're Lovable specialists. Till combines years of experience with Lovable's innovative platform to deliver projects faster and better than traditional development agencies.
